definition: there is no alternative
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
variant of 法[fa3]
old variant of 法[fa3]/law
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: There was clearly nothing left to do but flop down on the shabby little couch and howl.
sentences.chinese: 除了扑到破旧的小沙发里嚎哭显然别无他法。

sentences.english: Machine try a part to have no other way besides much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 机试部分除了多练习别无他法。

sentences.english: We can do nothing but to love, and this makes us lonelier .
sentences.chinese: 我们别无他法，只能相爱，而这令我们更加孤独。

sentences.english: None of this means that anxious smokers who want to stop are without recourse.
sentences.chinese: 以上这些都不能说明急切戒烟者想戒烟的话别无他法。

sentences.english: If that doesn’t make them take a step back, nothing will.
sentences.chinese: 如果这样都不能使对方后退一点，那就别无他法了。

sentences.english: They’re all but done for unless they change their focus, Jobs said.
sentences.chinese: 乔布斯说，他们除了改变他们的重点，别无他法。

sentences.english: The rats have no choice but to let her try.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠们别无他法，只好让她去试。

sentences.english: You can't get to the island other than by boat.
sentences.chinese: 要去那座岛，除了搭船以外，别无他法。

sentences.english: Jason and Maggie had nothing to do but accepted the fact.
sentences.chinese: 詹森和麦姬别无他法，只好接受眼前的事实。

definition: to have no other choice
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
to no avail/of no use
as matters stand/things having reached this stage
(idiom) dead end/road to ruin
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
won't work/will get (you) nowhere
unhelpful/useless
impotent (idiom)/powerless/helpless
to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances/forced into sth
impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
to worry helplessly
to brace oneself to do sth/to put a bold face on it/to summon up courage/to force oneself to
to settle for second best/the next best thing
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
to act against one's will/to have no alternative but to/to have to/to have no choice/must
